available_machines.name: Electric Wheel Barrow
available_machines.description:
The Garden Donkey™ Electric Dumper / Wheel Barrow is a clean and silent solution for transporting materials at home, farm, indoor job sites, or sensitive places where it is essential to work without fumes or noise.  The heavy duty unit has a 1000lb capacity and has a working time of 8-10hrs on a single charge. With its hydraulic dump it take all the work out of unloading. Renting a Garden Donkey is a cost-effective way to take on landscaping, construction, or gardening projects without the need to purchase expensive equipment. Enjoy faster project completion, less physical fatigue, and the satisfaction of getting the job done smarter — not harder. ***Not to be used for Concrete - $500.00 cleaning fee WILL apply.***
Would you like a slightly more casual or contractor-targeted version too? 💬🔧

available_machines.name: Track Drive Flail Mower
available_machines.description: Tackle tough mowing jobs with ease by renting an Orec flail mower. Built for power and durability, the Orec flail mower features a heavy-duty engine, adjustable cutting heights, and robust flail blades that effortlessly chop thick brush, tall grass, and even saplings. Its compact design and easy maneuverability allow you to navigate tight spaces and uneven terrain with confidence. Renting this professional-grade machine saves you time and energy on demanding land-clearing projects without the high cost of ownership. Whether you're maintaining trails, clearing overgrown fields, or reclaiming neglected properties, the Orec flail mower delivers exceptional performance, making your work faster, cleaner, and more efficient.

available_machines.name: Lawn Aerator | Stinger Stand on
available_machines.description: Boost your turf care results by renting the Stinger Quad AER 3000 with Seed Box. Designed for serious productivity, this stand-on aerator delivers unmatched speed and precision, covering up to two acres per hour with its powerful core aeration system. The added seed box attachment lets you aerate and overseed in a single efficient pass, saving time and maximizing results. With hydrostatic drive, independent wheel control, and easy maneuverability, the Quad AER 3000 handles hills, tight spaces, and open fields with ease. Renting this machine gives contractors, landscapers, and property managers professional-grade performance without the heavy upfront investment. Whether for residential lawns, sports fields, or commercial properties, the Stinger Quad AER 3000 helps your customers get greener, healthier turf — faster and easier.

available_machines.name: Ladder Aluminum | Step 12'
available_machines.short_description: 12′ aluminum commercial step ladder. Sturdy for inside use. This ladder is 14′ long when folded so you require at least that height to stand up. Measure twice and save the disappointment.

available_machines.name: Slab Vacuum - Lifter
available_machines.short_description: Vacuum lifter, the must-have for every large format products This vacuum machine is perfect for paving stones with a maximum weight of up to 150 lbs. The unit is adaptable and can be hung on a lifting device or can be easily handled by to people. It sucks and moves interlock stones and some natural stones to a designated location, eliminating the need for the operator to bend over or work on his knees. The unit can be plugged into a 120V 15amp curcuit or a small generator.

available_machines.short_description: Make your worksite safe by renting construction fence, each panel is 6’high and 8′ long and includes one foot per end(except the first) Panels lock together at top and sit on the foot. Call us for a quote and availability.

available_machines.name: Scaffold End-5x5 each
available_machines.short_description: We rent scaffold by the end in order to allow flexibility to your job needs. There is a base charge per contract so please call us for a quote.

available_machines.name: Roller- 1 Ton Double Drum
available_machines.description: The Wacker RD12 Roller is a compact yet powerful vibratory roller designed for efficient compaction of soil, gravel, asphalt, and other materials in various construction and landscaping projects. With a drum width of 35.4 inches and an operating weight of 2,765 pounds, this roller offers excellent maneuverability and compaction performance in tight spaces and on smaller job sites. Its dual drum design ensures uniform compaction throughout the surface, resulting in a smooth and stable finish. The RD12's hydrostatic drive system provides precise control over speed and direction, allowing operators to navigate obstacles with ease. Additionally, its ergonomic operator platform and intuitive controls enhance operator comfort and productivity during long work sessions. The Wacker RD12 Roller's reliable performance, compact size, and versatility make it an indispensable tool for achieving optimal compaction results in a variety of applications.
available_machines.short_description: 36″ ride on roller for compaction help around your site. Compact your driveway after a top dress, roll your lawn, prepare your base for patios, or buildings.

*** Unit is available for customer pick-up but only at our Carleton Place Location***

The ASV RT50 Track Skid Steer is 60” wide. Heavy enough for those larger landscaping and back filling projects. Tracks allow it to go over fresh sand and fill without sinking. Full Cab with heating and air conditioning.

These units weigh in at 5200 lbs roughly and require a tandem axle float if you are planning on picking up yourself. We also rent tilt deck float if you don’t have a trailer but have a truck with 10000 pounds towing capacity or more.

PLEASE NOTE: The rental of this unit does not include a trailer and there is a $200 cleaning charge if returned dirty.

It features durable nylon bristles and a wide sweeping surface, allowing for efficient clearing of leaves on walkways and driveways, as well as fluffing artificial turf. We rent this attachment on the MM Wheel Kit accessory for ultimate convenience and maneuverability. With the ability to cover an area up to 24 inches wide in a single pass, it makes quick work of sweeping jobs on paved surfaces. This attachment is known for its high quality and effectiveness in handling big cleanup jobs.

available_machines.name: Stump Grinder | Bandit SG-40
available_machines.short_description:
The Bandit SG-40 stump grinder is a compact and powerful machine designed to efficiently grind stumps in tight, restricted areas. It is equipped with a 38hp Kohler EFI engine, making it capable of plowing through nearly any stump. The rubber track undercarriage is gentle on delicate lawns yet strong enough to navigate rough terrain. The machine offers enhanced operator visibility and maneuverability, with two cutter wheel options available. Additionally, the controls are ergonomically designed for ease of use. With its state-of-the-art manufacturing, the Bandit SG-40 is a versatile and reliable solution for stump grinding professionals.

*** This unit is only available for pick-up and return from/to our Carleton Place Location***

available_machines.name: Power Head | STIHL KM 91R
available_machines.category: Lawn & Garden, Trimmer and KM units
available_machines.description: The Stihl KM powerhead is a versatile and robust tool designed to meet the diverse needs of professional landscapers and homeowners alike. Powered by a dependable engine, it offers ample torque and smooth operation for a wide range of attachments, making it the cornerstone of Stihl's KombiSystem. Its ergonomic design, featuring a comfortable loop handle and intuitive controls, ensures user comfort and ease of use during prolonged tasks. The Stihl KM powerhead's compact size and lightweight construction enhance maneuverability and reduce fatigue, while its easy-to-start system and low-emission engine contribute to environmental friendliness and operator convenience. With its compatibility with numerous attachments, from trimmers to cultivators to hedge trimmers, the Stihl KM powerhead offers unparalleled versatility and efficiency, empowering users to tackle various landscaping tasks with confidence and precision.
available_machines.short_description: The STIHL KM 91 R KombiMotor is a powerful and versatile professional-grade multi-tool designed for a wide range of outdoor maintenance tasks. It features a simplified start-up sequence for convenient starting, a larger fuel tank for increased battery life, and a paper air filter. The loop handle ensures good maneuverability, even in confined spaces, while the barrier bar protects against accidents. The KombiMotor offers 30% longer run time compared to previous models and is compatible with a full line of high-quality attachments. It is designed for comfort and ease of use, with an ergonomic design that reduces operator fatigue and an anti-vibration system. If you’re a landscaping professional looking for a dependable and efficient tool to streamline your operations, the STIHL KM 91 R KombiMotor is an excellent rental.

available_machines.name: Bed Redefiner Attachment | STIHL FBD-KM
available_machines.category: Lawn & Garden, Trimmer and KM units
available_machines.short_description: The STIHL FBD-KM Bed Redefiner is a durable and efficient KombiSystem attachment designed for maintaining mulch and flower beds. It features a clog-minimizing deflector design and a cost-effective cutting geometry blade, enabling you to complete the job up to seven times faster than manual methods. The attachment is recommended for use with the KM 130 R, but can also be used with the KM 90 R and KM 110 R. Additionally, it includes a solid drive shaft and a protective gearbox plate, making it a durable and affordable alternative to a dedicated bed redefiner. The attachment’s adjustable depth wheel provides precision control, and it is suitable for professional gardeners, homeowners, and tree experts. Power Head Required

available_machines.name: Edger Attachment | STIHL FCB-KM
available_machines.category: Lawn & Garden, Trimmer and KM units
available_machines.short_description: The STIHL FC 70 Edger is a professional curved-shaft edger designed for high performance and efficiency. It is powered by a low-emission, fuel-efficient engine that offers longer run times between refueling and up to 28% fuel savings compared to previous models. The “open” guard design helps minimize clogging, allowing for more efficient cutting. Its advanced fuel-saving technology and comfortable curved-shaft design make it an ideal choice for both home and professional use.

available_machines.name: Tiller Attachment | STIHL BF-KM Cultivator
available_machines.category: Lawn & Garden, Trimmer and KM units
available_machines.description: The Stihl KM cultivator attachment is a versatile tool designed to simplify soil cultivation tasks with exceptional efficiency and precision. Engineered to attach seamlessly to Stihl's KM series powerheads(Rent a powerhead from us or use your own), this cultivator boasts robust construction and durable tines that effortlessly break up soil, aerate, and mix amendments with minimal effort. Its adjustable tine spacing allows for customization to suit different soil types and cultivation needs, while its compact design enables easy maneuverability even in tight spaces. Whether preparing garden beds, cultivating between rows, or tackling small-scale landscaping projects, the Stihl KM cultivator attachment streamlines the cultivation process, saving time and effort while delivering optimal results for gardeners and landscapers alike. NOTE: Power head required https://rentalvillage.ca/product/stihl-power-head/
available_machines.short_description: Transform your STIHL KombiMotor into a handheld cultivator with the BF-KM mini-cultivator attachment. Part of the STIHL KombiSystem series of attachments, this lightweight cultivator is ideal for getting into tight places and mixing things up. Use it to rejuvenate flowerbeds and other planting areas. It’s also great for mixing amendments into the soil. It’s an attachment no gardener should be without.

available_machines.name: Pole Pruner Attachment | STIHL HT-KM
available_machines.category: Lawn & Garden, Trimmer and KM units
available_machines.short_description: The STIHL HT-KM pole pruner is an efficient tool for professional landscapers, municipal operations, and fruit growers. It allows for the sawing of higher branches while standing comfortably on the ground, making it perfect for tree maintenance. The KombiTool has a total length of 126 cm, enabling users to reach branches at heights up to 3 m. With a compact and lightweight design, ergonomic working is facilitated. The STIHL HT-KM pole pruner is compatible with all STIHL KombiEngines and features a quick coupling mechanism for easy connection. Power Head Required.

available_machines.name: Hedge Trimmer Attachment | Stihl HL-KM
available_machines.description: The Stihl KM hedge trimmer attachment offers a convenient and efficient solution for maintaining hedges and shrubs with precision and ease. Designed to be compatible with Stihl's KM series powerheads, this attachment features sharp, dual-sided cutting blades that effortlessly slice through branches and foliage, ensuring clean and uniform cuts. Its adjustable blade angle and lightweight design provide excellent maneuverability, allowing users to trim hedges at various heights and angles without strain. With its durable construction and reliable performance, the Stihl KM hedge trimmer attachment is a valuable addition to any landscaping toolkit, enabling users to achieve professional-looking results with minimal effort and maximum efficiency. NOTE: Power head required. https://rentalvillage.ca/product/stihl-power-head/
available_machines.short_description: The STIHL HL-KM 145° adjustable hedge trimmer attachment is designed for demanding work on high hedges or for work close to the ground. Its lightweight gearbox and modern color scheme provide excellent, flexible cutting performance. With a 145° working range, it is compatible with the STIHL KombiSystem and is lighter than previous models, helping to reduce fatigue when trimming numerous and extensive hedges. The attachment features a 60cm double-sided cutting blade that is versatile and easily adjustable in increments for a better working position and compact storage. It is ideal for efficient cutting, trimming, and shaping high hedges in heavy-duty applications, making it a valuable addition to your gardening tools arsenal.

available_machines.name: Line Attachment | STIHL FS-KM
available_machines.category: Lawn & Garden, Trimmer and KM units
available_machines.short_description: The FS-KM Line Head Trimmer KombiTool is a versatile attachment designed for mowing and trimming around obstacles. It uses the dependable AutoCut head and delivers greater maneuverability around landscape obstacles. The attachment is suitable for use with all KombiEngines, making it a perfect tool for edging up the lawn, trimming around obstacles, and general grass maintenance. The AutoCut mowing head makes refilling the line easy, and the straight shaft is strong and durable.

With a 20-ton splitting force and the Honda GX160 engine, this log splitter is capable of handling any size of job. It can split wood both horizontally and vertically, and its average cycle time is approximately 13 seconds.

The sprayer also features a large 12-liter tank capacity, reducing the need for frequent refills, while its adjustable spray nozzle allows for customizable application based on specific needs. The benefits of the Stihl SR450 extend beyond its features, as it enables users to cover large areas quickly and effectively, whether for mosquito and tick control, weed management, or applying fertilizers. Its reliability, durability, and ease of use make it an indispensable tool for professionals and homeowners alike in maintaining lush and healthy outdoor spaces. Check out our stock on garlic based spray for mosquito and tick control.

available_machines.short_description:
This professional grade Ozone Generator can be used virtually anywhere odors are a problem. In fact, hospitals around the world use large ozone generators to decontaminate operating rooms between surgeries. Here are just of a few examples of where to use OdorStop:

Real Estate Sales — freshen air before open houses
Rental Properties — clean and sanitize between tenants
Automobiles — get rid of cigarette odors and stale smells in pre-owned vehicles
Boats/Yachts — refresh interior cabin air and eliminate musty smells
Office Buildings — clean and sanitize work spaces for better employee health
Janitorial Services — offer as an additional cleaning service
Fitness Facilities — remove odors overnight
Smoke Damage — remove smoke odors following a fire
Remodeling — include as part of remodeling clean-up

available_machines.short_description: 85000 BTU heater with duct. This unit is direct fired meaning the exhaust fumes exit the tube with hot air. available_machines.name: Heater 200000 BTU | Ducted Indirect
available_machines.short_description: This 200000 BTU heater is just like your home oil or gas burning furnace with a chimney.  It provides 100% clean dry air which eliminates the chance of carbon monoxide being pumped into your work space.  It runs on #1 or #2 diesel or kerosene & burns approximately 1.30 gallons per hour.  With its large 42 gallon fuel tank it will run for 30 hours +/- between fills.  It comes complete with (1) thermostat & (1) 12″ x 25″ duct.  Additional 25′ ducts are available if more length is required.

available_machines.name: Hepa 500 | Air Scrubber
available_machines.short_description:
Rugged-built, high-efficiency air filtration. Restore and maintain indoor air quality during cleaning, remodels and remediation. Suitable for use in homes, light industrial settings, schools, hospitality venues and healthcare environments – wherever portable, efficient HEPA filtration is needed. Primary and secondary filters extra at roughly $28. HEPA FILTER INCLUDED. Carbon filter available to remove smells at extra cost.

Specs

Air movement:  250–500 CFM

Circuit maximum:  Plug up to four units together for a total of 2000 CFM on a single 15-amp circuit

Static pressure:  2.9 in. (H2O)

Use weight:  44 lbs. | 19.9 kg

Dimensions (W × H × D):  26.2 × 24.6 × 18.2 in. ¦ 66.5 × 62.5 × 46.2 cm

Duct sizes:  Intake: 12 in. / Outlet: 8 in.

Volts:  115V

Frequency:  60 Hz

Amps:  3A

Housing:  Rotomolded polyethylene

Power cord length:  25 ft. | 7.62 m

Power outlet:  GFCI protected

Pre-filter:  Standard paper pre-filters, plus activated carbon (F397) and DOP (F415) filter options

Primary filter:  HEPA filtration technology

Prevent mold by drying quickly and pair it up with a dehumidifier to take the moisture from the air.

available_machines.name: Leaf Blower/Vac | STIHL SH 56 C
available_machines.short_description: The Stihl BG 56 C-E handheld petrol leaf blower is designed to make garden work easier by effortlessly cleaning up leaves and debris on paths or driveways around the home. Featuring the STIHL ErgoStart system, it ensures smooth starts with a specialized stop switch and semi-automatic choke lever. With the Easy2Start system and a high-performance, low emissions engine, this blower is environmentally responsible and comfortable to use. The blower has been rated highly for its ease of use and is part of the Leaf Blowers test program at Consumer Reports. **Warning, once you give it a try you’ll probably want to own one**

available_machines.name: 9HP Rear Tine Rototiller
available_machines.short_description: Till effectively in small spaces by using this 18″ wide machine.  The unique swivel handlebar featured on this compact unit means you can walk alongside your tiller rather than in your freshly tilled earth.  Don’t let this narrow machine fool you,  with its heavy design the tiller works for you instead of tossing you around.  Counter-rotating tines break up the most difficult soil, clay, or sod.  Wheels and tines work independently of each other to allow your tilling travel speed to be adjusted to the soil conditions.  This easy to use machine comes on it own trailer for easy pick-up (2″ ball required).  Call your local store and book yours today!

available_machines.name: 6HP Stump Grinder | Dosko
available_machines.short_description: The stump grinder featured here is powered by reliable Honda engines and is designed to be compact, portable, and easy to use. It’s equipped with Green Tooth cutting systems and offer a versatile and robust solution for grinding stumps. The unique side discharge chassis provides a clearer line of vision while grinding, and some models feature a foldable design for easy transportation and storage. With features such as cyclone air cleaners, direct belt drives, and adjustable handlebars, these stump grinders are suitable for efficiently removing stumps in various environments. If you are looking for a portable and efficient stump grinding solution, this product offer quality and ease of use.

available_machines.name: Lawn Dethatcher | Ryan Turf Ren-O-Thin Power Rake
available_machines.short_description: Over time your lawn builds up a layer of thatch which act as a barrier to water and air penetration into soil. the concept of the de-thatcher is similar to an aggressive rake with a hard back garden rake taking the layer of thatch up off the soil. Don’t be alarmed by the appearance as the lawn will fill back in as the nutrients are able to sink in. You will find this to work best if you wait until your grass has greened up after winter and can be done at any point after that providing you supply enough moisture to help it recover.

available_machines.name: Lawn Roller | Kesmac KTR 30
available_machines.short_description: When you need heavy flatting force for your lawn after winter or new sod this is the tool for you. When filled with water it weighs in at 850 lbs. Even empty it is a heavy machine so you need a trailer with a ramp or a good set of ramps for your pickup.

available_machines.name: Pole Pruner Manual | Fiskars Extendable Pole Saw & Pruner (7'–16')
available_machines.short_description: A safe and affordable way to trim up the trees on your property.  With the folding saw blade & pruning shear it is perfect for any size job.  Leave your ladder in the shed, this unit extends up to 14′ and will manage branches up to 2″.

available_machines.name: Electric Chainsaw | STIHL MSE 141
available_machines.short_description: The MSE 141 C-Q electric chainsaw is a lightweight and affordable option, making it ideal for homeowners and carpenters. With a powerhead just over six pounds, it is the lightest electric chainsaw in its class, suitable for a variety of outdoor and indoor tasks such as firewood cutting, storm cleanup, and woodworking. The saw is packed with premium features including a coast-down brake, low-kickback chain, and an extension cord retainer. Additionally, it offers good ergonomics for effortless work, side-mounted chain tensioning, Quickstop Super chain brake, and overload protection. If you’re looking for a reliable and maneuverable electric chainsaw with good cutting performance, the MSE 141 C-Q is a great choice.

available_machines.name: Turf Revitalizer | Classen HTS-20H PRO Hydro-Drive
Towable Sprayer 25 Gallon | Chapin 97700E
available_machines.short_description:
A tow-behind lawn sprayer offers a convenient and efficient solution for large-scale lawn care and maintenance tasks. Featuring a sturdy frame and durable materials, it can be easily attached to a variety of vehicles, including lawn tractors and ATVs. The sprayer typically comes equipped with a high-capacity tank, allowing for extended spraying sessions without the need for frequent refills. Adjustable spray nozzles enable users to customize application patterns and coverage, ensuring even distribution of fertilizers, herbicides, or pesticides across the lawn. Additionally, many tow-behind sprayers feature a boom or wand attachment, providing versatility in reaching tight corners or specific areas. The benefits of a tow-behind lawn sprayer include time and labor savings, as well as the ability to efficiently maintain large lawns or fields with minimal effort, resulting in healthier, more vibrant vegetation.

Rental rates do not include cleaning so please flush when finished.

available_machines.name: Towable Spreader 130lb | Agri-Fab 45-0463
available_machines.short_description: The Agri-Fab 130 lb. Tow Broadcast Spreader is designed to be towed by a lawn tractor, offering a capacity of up to 130 lb. for spreading ice melt, fertilizer, and seed with a 12 ft. spread width. It features a commercial-grade gearbox, easy-set controls, and pneumatic tires for maneuverability. The enclosed gearbox prevents disruption during spreading. With a durable rod-linked on-off control, precise settings, and large diameter tires for stability on rough terrain, this spreader is suitable for larger acreage lawns. Additionally, it can be towed behind ride-on mowers, quads, or ATVs, making it versatile for various outdoor maintenance tasks. If you’re looking for a reliable and versatile tow broadcast spreader, the Agri-Fab 130 lb. Tow Broadcast Spreader is a great choice.

available_machines.name: Lawn Roller Push | Agri-Fab 45-0267
available_machines.short_description: Fill with water and roll on- weights around 250 when full and is very light for transport when empty.

available_machines.name: Lawn Roller Towable | Agri-Fab 45-0269
available_machines.description: The Agri-Fab Push/Tow Lawn and Garden Roller is a versatile and efficient tool for maintaining a smooth and even lawn. It can be hand-pushed or towed behind a ride-on mower, making it suitable for various lawn sizes. With a lightweight design, weighing just 40 lbs when empty and 250 lbs when full, it is easy to transport and store. The roller features a corrosion-resistant poly drum with smoothly-moulded edges to prevent turf damage during use. Whether you need to tackle uneven ground, pack down newly sown seed, or flatten sod after frost or pest damage, the Agri-Fab roller is designed to make the job quick and easy

available_machines.name: Lawn Mowers | Honda HRS216PKA
available_machines.description: The Honda  Walk-Behind   push Lawn Mower is a powerful and reliable choice for maintaining your lawn. With a 21-inch cutting width and a powerful Honda GCV170 engine, this mower offers outstanding performance and maneuverability, especially on tough terrain. The mower's large back wheels make it easy to navigate around hills and uneven ground, while the NeXite deck material ensures durability and resistance to dents, rust, and corrosion over time.
available_machines.short_description: Honda 21″ lawnmower works just as you expect a Honda would. Adjustable wheel to get you set at the height you want your grass to be.

available_machines.name: Fertilizer Spreader Push | Agri-Fab 45-0388
available_machines.short_description: The Agri-Fab Push Broadcast Spreader is a versatile tool suitable for spreading fertilizer, seed, or ice melt. With a durable plastic hopper and closure plate, this spreader resists corrosion for long-lasting use. The positive flow adjustment design ensures accurate spread patterns up to 10 ft. wide. The 85 lb. capacity allows for less time spent refilling the spreader, and it covers up to 14,000 square feet, making it ideal for expansive lawn maintenance. The ergonomic handle design and large tires make lawn care easy, while the fully enclosed gearbox protects the gears. This spreader is designed for precise application and even distribution of materials. If you’re looking for a reliable spreader to maintain a lush lawn, the Agri-Fab Push Broadcast Spreader is a great choice.

available_machines.category: Lawn & Garden, Trimmer and KM units
available_machines.description: The Stihl KM power sweep attachment is a versatile tool designed to simplify debris and snow removal tasks with exceptional efficiency and precision. Engineered to attach seamlessly to Stihl's KM series powerheads, this attachment features a durable rubber paddle that effectively sweeps debris, leaves, and light snow from paths, driveways, gravel from grass and other surfaces. Its adjustable height and angle allow for customizable sweeping, ensuring thorough cleaning in various conditions. The Stihl KM power sweep attachment's compact design and lightweight construction enhance maneuverability, making it easy to navigate tight spaces and corners. With its reliable performance and easy-to-use design, the Stihl KM power sweep attachment streamlines cleanup tasks, saving time and effort while maintaining pristine outdoor spaces year-round. NOTE: Power head required. https://rentalvillage.ca/product/stihl-power-head/
available_machines.short_description: Looking for a quick & easy way to clean-up your yard this spring?  This is the tool for the job!  The power broom is the perfect tool to clean-up after the snow plows or blowers.  It will clean-up your driveway as well as remove stones from your lawn.  The ideal time to use this unit is when your lawn/yard has dried up & just when you start to see signs of the grass starting to grow.  This is the attachment that fits the Stihl KM series units, rent one or use your own motor.

Additionally, the blower comes with a specially designed nylon harness for high wear resistance. With its unmatched power, ergonomic design, and environmental responsibility, it’s the top choice for demanding outdoor cleanup tasks. The blower is equipped with an innovative 4-MIX engine for a more pleasant sound, low fuel consumption, and low emissions.

With solid rod linkage to the transmission and cutter blade clutch, worry-free cutting is ensured. The rugged design and top-of-the-line features make the Little Wonder Hydro Brush Cutter a clear-cut winner for demanding landscaping tasks.

The use of hydraulics provides variable auger speed and reverse capabilities, while the locking mechanism on the digging head allows the auger to be held up and out of the way for easy maneuvering around the job site. With a maximum drilling torque of 275 foot-pounds, this auger is well-suited for professional landscapers, contractors, and DIY enthusiasts. If you’re looking for a high-quality, durable, and reliable earth auger, the BravePro Hydraulic 1-Man Towable Earth Auger is an excellent choice.

available_machines.name: Telehandler | JCB 13'
available_machines.short_description:
The JCB Telehandler is small but mighty.  It is available with pallet forks as well as a material bucket making it the ideal machine for landscape projects.  With its 4400lb lift capacity it can easily move heavy pallets or armour stone around your yard.  Clip on the bucket and now you can move your aggregates around as well.  This machine also has a telescopic boom which provides extra reach.  This simple to operate 4 wheel drive and 4 wheel steer machine is versatile on any jobsite.

Quick Specs

39 HP Diesel Engine

Overall Width – 60″

Overall Height – 80″

Max. Reach at Full Extension – 2’11”

Climate Controlled Enclosed Cab

Available with Pallet Forks and 60″ Material Bucket

available_machines.short_description: Small drain electric snake with a 35′ cable 5/16″ diameter to get though those tough blocks.  Variable speed and auto-feed.

available_machines.name: Sewer Snake | Manual 50'
available_machines.short_description: 50′ manual drain cleaner for use in 3″ and up drains.

available_machines.name: Sewer Snake | Manual 25'
available_machines.short_description: Hand turn drain snake for small drains. 25′ snake with manual lock.

available_machines.name: Sewer Snake | 50' Electric
available_machines.short_description: 50′ electric drain snake for 3-6″ drain lines, various heads for chase through the pipe and clean out the blocks. Manual feed and electric turn.

available_machines.name: Sewer Snake | Electric 25'
available_machines.short_description: Small drain cleaner, electric powered. See video for more details.

available_machines.name: Sewer Snake | 100' Electric
available_machines.short_description: 100′ electric sewer cleaner for 4+ ” drains.

available_machines.name: Sewer Snake | 50' Auto Feed
available_machines.short_description: 50′ drain snake with auto feed. Designed to manage large drains.

available_machines.name: Pipe Thaw | Unit
available_machines.short_description: Hot water pulse style pipe thaw unit built specifically for frozen pipes. 250′ of clean water hose and 100ft of sewer hose to select based on project.

available_machines.name: 7" Handheld | Concrete Grinder
available_machines.short_description: Large grinder with a diamond grinding wheel for leveling, smoothing or removing concrete surfaces.

available_machines.name: Wheelbarrow
available_machines.short_description: Great for moving dirt, leaves, stones, and many more materials around the yard or job site.  Unit is equipped with foam filled no-flat tire for added durability.

available_machines.name: Propane Torch | 400,000BTU
available_machines.short_description: Commercial style propane torch, 500,000 BTU. Hook up to your 20 lbs propane tank or rent one from us. Uses include melting ice, softening certain glue products, and burning weeds in concrete or paver walkways.

available_machines.name: Strip-Sert Accessory | Dual Head Grinder
available_machines.short_description:
Strip-Serts are  carbide tipped blocks designed to clean surfaces without grinding into the concrete.  Strip-Serts  have 4 tungsten carbide edges that can be rotated for maximum use.  They are ideal to strip away thicker, soft material It is ideal for removing mastics, paints, resins, tar, and other build-ups.

For info on application and unit it fits visit:  https://www.edcoinc.com/products/view/wedgeless-dual-disc-floor-grinder/

available_machines.name: Concrete Scarifier | Gas Powered
available_machines.short_description: Best for bringing down larger gaps in elevation on side walks or smaller shelves of concrete. Cutter head priced separately.

available_machines.name: Floor | Grinder
available_machines.short_description: For medium sized grinding jobs that require smoothing or polishing of concrete. Fine dust vacuum recommended. Runs on 15 Amp circuit. Unit requires purchase of the diamond blocks or discs in addition to rental. Prices vary depending on your job starting at $240 for diamond blocks for grinding concrete.

available_machines.name: Diamond Cutter Heads | Dual Head Grinder
available_machines.short_description: Light grinding or cleaning of concrete surfaces, leveling uneven joints and prepping for other coatings are the most common uses. For more information please visit: https://www.edcoinc.com/products/view/wedgeless-dual-disc-floor-grinder/

available_machines.name: Concrete Floor Grinder | Dual Head
available_machines.short_description: The Edco Dual Head Grinder is designed to level, smooth or clean concrete slab surfaces.  With it’s 22″ working width it will grind approximately 400-500 sq. ft. per hour removing 1/32″ each pass.  With a choice of accessories the unit can be adapted to suit your application.  From light grinding or cleaning of concrete surfaces, leveling uneven joints, removing mastics, thin-set, high spots, epoxies and urethanes.  The Edco grinder is designed for dustless use & has provisions to hook-up to a fine dust vacuum.   PRICE LISTED IS FOR MACHINE ONLY, cutter heads are rented separately.  We offer the Dyma-Sert & Strip-Sert Accessories.  Watch the Video to get a better understanding what the machine can do for you.

available_machines.name: Skidsteer | Sweeper 72"
available_machines.short_description:
Standard skid steer mount pick-up broom with hydraulically driven broom and built in bucket to catch sweepings. Unit uses three hydraulic hoses so if you plan on using your own skid steer ensure you have the correct fittings available. Care needs to be taken when sweeping around obstacles as damage waiver will not cover damage caused by striking something
and bending it. Best to consider a hand held power broom to do around the edges which we can rent you as well. This unit is available only at our Carleton
Place location so reach out to us to book. I you need to rent a skidsteer as well the SV65 Kubota will be the best unit for it.

available_machines.name: Backhoe Loader | Kubota B23
available_machines.short_description:
Kubota pioneered the sub-compact 4-wheel drive diesel tractor, making it efficiently preform a variety of gardening, landscaping, and general property maintenance tasks. A fuel-efficient 3-cylinder diesel engine provides plenty of power to haul, climb, and pull your way through even the most challenging tasks.
Unit is rented on a trailer which you can tow behind your vehicle with 2″ ball and 5000 lbs towing capacity.

These units weigh in at 3000 lbs roughly and includes a trailer. Your towing capacity needs to be over 5000 pounds with a 2” ball.

available_machines.name: Pressure Washer | Gas 3200PSI
available_machines.short_description:
Only for the toughest jobs, this unit has more than enough power to remove paint, dirt and any unwanted foreign material.
This unit has an adjustable PSI range and comes with nozzles and 50′ of pressure hose.

available_machines.name: Pressure Washer | Ext. Wand 18'
available_machines.short_description: Great for the hard to reach areas including windows, gutters and roofs.

available_machines.name: Pressure Washer | Gas 2500PSI
available_machines.short_description:
Gas powered pressure washers are the perfect choice to clean or resurface many things when a smaller electric unit just isn’t enough. They are the
ideal choice for cleaning decks, driveways and many other chores around the property.  Comes with nozzles and 25′ of pressure hose.

available_machines.name: Pressure Washer | Electric 1000PSI
available_machines.short_description: Light duty electric unit for standard home use. Comes with nozzles and 50′ of pressure hose.

available_machines.name: Hydraulic Jack | 20 Ton
available_machines.short_description: Small condensed unit for leveling a cottage or jacking up a deck. Twenty tonne capacity, 9 1/2″-17 3/4″ height.

available_machines.name: Travel Jack 48" | 1500LB Capacity
available_machines.short_description: A light duty jack to lift lighter projects to a higher level. 6″-48″ travel

available_machines.name: Grinder | 7 Inch
available_machines.short_description: Large grinder with multiple uses including grinding and cutting. See concrete grinder for diamond grinding tool.

available_machines.name: Grinder | 4 1/2
available_machines.short_description: Great unit for smaller grinding and cutting jobs. Standard 7/8″ arbor.

available_machines.name: Air Drill | 38Lbs
available_machines.short_description: For use with the 185 or 70 CFM air compressors, drills 1 1/2″ to 2 1/2″ holes. Two or four foot drill steels available. Carbide tipped drill bits used to drill for anchors, fencing posts or rock breaking jobs.

available_machines.name: Air Compressor | 5.5HP 12.5CFM
available_machines.short_description: When you have no electricity or need that extra power, this compressor won’t disappoint. Three ports available for different lines to different tools and is also great for blowing out smaller residential lines for winterizing the cottage.

available_machines.name: Air Compressor | Electric 2HP
available_machines.short_description: Smaller compressor for indoor or outdoor jobs with smaller demands.

available_machines.name: Air Compressor | 70CFM Portable
available_machines.short_description: Large enough to handle a 60lb breaker but small enough to fit in the back of an SUV. One man moveable, 70 CFM output at 100psi, with a Chicago air hose fitting. Removable gas tank holds 20L. Electric start.

available_machines.name: Air Compressor | 185CFM Towable
available_machines.short_description: Large diesel tow behind unit only requires a 2″ ball for towing. Total output of 185CFM at 100 psi is great for air breakers, air drills, blowing out water lines, and large capacity sand blasters.

available_machines.name: Air Breaker | 60Lbs
available_machines.short_description: This air powered 60lb breaker can handle many problems. If you have to break off an old concrete step, or clean out holes for a fence or a deck, this unit will do the job.

available_machines.name: Walk Behind | 18" Trencher
available_machines.short_description: Walk-behind trencher digs a 4″ wide by 18″ deep trench for easy laying of pipe or wiring. Trailer with 2″ ball available with unit.

available_machines.name: Stump Grinder 13HP | Dosko 337S-13HC
available_machines.short_description:
Sick of cutting around those pesky stumps, rent this tool to ease your pain. Just dig around the stump to make sure there is no rocks and grind the stump below grade and cover over.
10-12 ” stump should take you less than 30 minutes if you have it cut down to 2 ” above the ground with your chainsaw.

available_machines.name: Turf Revitalizer | Classen HTS-20H PRO Hydro-Drive
available_machines.short_description:
Touch up your dead spots on your lawn with some fresh seed and turn them green.

The Classen HTS-20H is designed to make seeding easier and more efficient. This self-propelled machine feature hydrostatic drive and a floating seed box that ensures precise seed placement, resulting in thicker and healthier turf. With features like a Honda engine, 13 double-bladed shafts, and a narrow 1.5-inch seed row spacing, the overseeders provide carpet-like coverage even on uneven terrain. Whether for commercial or residential use, this overseeders offer the power and convenience needed to quickly achieve lush, healthy grass. For those seeking a reliable and effective solution for lawn overseeding, the Classen turf overseeders are a top choice.

available_machines.name: Lawn Aerator | Ryan Lawnaire IV Aerator
available_machines.short_description: The Lawnaire IV aerators has Easy Steer Technology and is designed for lawn care operators and rental houses looking for top-quality lawn care equipment. this drum-style, self-propelled aerators combines performance, durability, and ease of use, making it ideal for both small and large lawn care contractors. The Easy Steer Technology allows for efficient maneuvering around highly landscaped areas, while the innovative tine assemblies enable steering without removing the tines from the ground. With aeration widths of 19 inches, the Lawnaire IV was named the “best walk-behind aerator” by Bob Vila in 2022. Check out the benefits here.

available_machines.name: Skidsteer Track | Kubota SVL65
available_machines.short_description:
*** Unit is available for customer pick-up but only at our Carleton Place Location***

Kubota SV65 Track Skid Steer is 68” wide. Heavy enough for those larger landscaping and back filling projects. Tracks allow it to go over fresh sand and fill without sinking. Full Cab with heating and air conditioning.

These units weigh in at 6500 lbs roughly and require a tandem axle float if you are planning on picking up yourself. We also rent tilt deck float if you don’t have a trailer but have a truck with 10000 pounds towing capacity or more.

PLEASE NOTE: The rental of this unit does not include a trailer and there is a $200 cleaning charge if returned dirty.

available_machines.name: Excavator 1.8 Ton | Kubota U17
available_machines.short_description:
This unit is the Kubota KX-018 with the strength and durability the brand is know for. It features the dual track position offering stability when at its wide mode of 52″ and compact width of 39″ with the tracks retracted.
These machines weighs in at 3900 lbs and you are able to pick up yourself if you have a trailer capable of handling or have us deliver. Rental rate does not include a trailer.

available_machines.name: Skidsteer Wheeled | Kubota SSV65
available_machines.short_description:
*** Unit is available for customer pick-up but only at our Carleton Place Location***

Stack it, haul it, dig it and move it better with a Kubota skid steer loader. The SSV65 is a  powerful and dependable machine that is easy to operate and provides exceptional operator comfort. Hop into the roomy climate controlled cab
and tackle whatever job you have in front of you!  Delivery service available or rent a trailer and to take it home yourself.  Tow vehicle must have a minimum 10000lb tow capacity.

available_machines.name: Backhoe Loader | Kubota B26
available_machines.description:
We have chosen the Kubota B26 tractor backhoe for its reliability, ease of operation and its very capable attributes for the size.

The loader bucket is 62″ wide and holds roughly 1/3 yd of material and the backhoe bucket is 16″ wide with digging teeth and a hydraulic thumb.

These units weigh in at 5600 lbs roughly and require a tandem axle float if you are planning on picking up yourself. We also rent tilt deck float if you don’t have a trailer but have a truck with 6500 pounds towing capacity or more.

PLEASE NOTE: The rental of this tractor does not include a trailer.

available_machines.name: Baker Scaffold
available_machines.short_description: Small, lightweight, aluminum scaffold great for drywall, painting, and working on stairs. Each set is 24″ wide and 6′ high and can be stacked two high. (Rents as a complete set-two ends, one platform and 4 wheels)

available_machines.name: 19' Scissor | Lift
available_machines.short_description: Compact indoor scissor lift which lifts your feet to 19′. Unit is 32″ wide and 6′ long with a telescopic work platform. These machines have very little clearance so will only load on a roll off truck or tilt deck trailer. Work site needs to be perfectly flat and hard or these lifts won’t work so on a slab is best plan. Check with us regarding delivery services.

available_machines.name: Towable Man | Lift 50'
available_machines.description:
The Nifty Lift TM50 Towable Lift offers unparalleled flexibility and convenience for accessing elevated work areas. Its towable design allows for easy transportation to different job sites, making it an ideal choice for contractors and homeowners. Tows behind a vehicle that can handle 6000 lbs and uses a 2" ball. With a maximum working height of 50 feet and an outreach of 30 feet, this lift provides ample reach for a wide range of tasks, from maintenance to construction projects. Equipped with a telescopic boom and articulated jib, operators can navigate around obstacles with precision and efficiency. The lift's lightweight construction and hydraulic outriggers ensure stability and safety during operation. Furthermore, its intuitive controls and quick setup time maximize productivity on the job site. Overall, the Nifty Lift TM50 Towable Lift offers versatility, convenience, and performance, making it an essential tool for professionals in various industries. See the links below to access specs and video. Pay close attention the the width of the unit with stabilizers down to ensure you have enough space on your site. Our unit doesn't have the drive assist on wheels. Specs: https://www.niftylift.com/application/files/9216/7084/8457/TM50_IS-111.pdf
Introduction and set up:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I0_BLzb3Edg&t=21s
available_machines.short_description:
Safe and easy way to get up to that project you are regretting. These units are towable with a full sized truck with a tow capacity of over 5000 lbs,  2″ ball and  20″ minimum hitch height which
is required to keep the front wheel from dragging while in transit. Check the specs sheet on line to make sure you can reach your job or stop by and pick one up at any of our stores.
These units tend to be busy and can land at any of our stores so make sure you call ahead and book to ensure you have it when you need it.

available_machines.name: Track Driven | Lift 42'
available_machines.short_description:
*** This unit is only available for pick-up and return from/to our Carleton Place Location***

Safe and easy and maneuverable way to complete that project. This unit offer exceptional all-around performance from a compact and low weight base, and with a 225kg
safe-working-load, plenty of capacity for tools as well. The tracks give you amazing traction even on rough terrain but are also design to be anti-marking. Unit weighs 4400 lbs so towable on a tandem axle float with appropriate sized truck.
